content: SF 2H-A12 Cordless hammer drill driver Subcompact-class 12V brushless hammer drill driver for when you need access, low weight and high control ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features More compact than ever – the cordless hammer drill driver for working in cramped or hard-to-reach spaces Minimized weight – especially when working overhead or bigger jobs, a lighter drill driver is key to sustained productivity Upgraded ergonomics – fits firmly in your grip, for more comfortable handling and precise control Brushless motor – virtually maintenance-free to minimize tool downtime Redesigned lighting – for a brighter, shadowless and glare-free view of where you’re drilling Applications Hammer drilling up to 6 mm diameter in brick, masonry, sand-lime block and aerated concrete Installing electrical switches, sockets, pipe rings and other equipment Drilling with HSS bits up to 6 mm diameter in metal Drilling with auger and spade bits up to 14 mm diameter in wood Hole sawing up to 35 mm diameter in metal ### TECHNICAL DATA: Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint): 186 in-lb (soft joint), 301 in-lb (hard joint) No load RPM: gear 1: 400 rpm; gear 2: 1600 rpm Chuck clamping range: 1/32 - 13/32 in Technical Data | Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint) | 186 in-lb (soft joint), 301 in-lb (hard joint) | No load RPM | gear 1: 400 rpm; gear 2: 1600 rpm | Chuck clamping range | 1/32 - 13/32 in | Number of gears | 2 | Torque increments | 15 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 6.8 x 2.7 x 7 in | Tool body weight | 1.9 lb | Rated voltage | 10.8 V ### ITEMS- 3536723 - 12V cordless Hammer Drill/Driver - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x S Soft Pouch - 2200162 - SF 2H-A12 12v hammer drill driver - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver
